Entry.JapaneseText: 命に色はない、か……ガジュマも ヒューマも同じってコトだよネ……
Entry.EnglishText: "Life knows no color," huh... That means that Gajuma and Huma are the same...

Entry.JapaneseText: それだけではない……国王であろうと、 一介の市民であろうと、その差はないという事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Not only that, it means that there is no difference in whether you are a king or a commoner either.

Entry.JapaneseText: バースはラドラス陛下の主治医だったが、バルカに 診療所を作り、人々の病の治療にも携わっていた。
Entry.EnglishText: Though he was King Ladras's personal physician, Barrs also founded a clinic in Balka to tend to the ill.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……お父さんの気持ち、 <Annie>がわかってくれるといいネ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... It would be nice if <Annie> were to come to understand her father's beliefs...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかってくれるさ…… バースの娘なんだからな……
Entry.EnglishText: She will... She's Barrs's daughter, after all...
